name: 5k_celebration_jam_game
description:
An unfinished jam game.

Only a small part of a level has been made, 1 weapon type and 1 enemy type.

It still needs sound effects, music, and a lot more. but i decided i still should upload it non the less.

The story i wanted to add is that you are a grim reaper and you need to reap the souls of those that recently died. but when you go to the place where a lot of monsters supposedly died you see that all those who should have died, did not. so it is up to you to fix this. (basicly the main hero of 'insert any shooter' did not show up, so now you need to 'fix' it all).

Source code: https://git.ragarock.moe/5kJam/about/

Credits: https://git.ragarock.moe/5kJam/tree/credits
